items.text: Waking up early feels natural and comfortable
I'm most focused and creative late at night
I plan my schedule down to the minute
I'm comfortable moving spontaneously without plans
I use time leisurely without rushing
I'm used to handling multiple things at once
I focus on finishing one thing at a time
